column1: Since the new app is social media, I added 4 p3.2xlarge, removed 2 m5a.4xlarge and increased S3 storage ten times for more media storage. I would have added S3 lambda to log or do some other tasks and Glacier but the cost for Glacier and Lambda is low so it doesnt matter
